subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The 2008 Detroit Lions will be immortalized as the N.F.L’s worst team, but in a season in which so many teams played so badly, it is almost a shame that the Lions have to go into the record books alone.
snippet: The 2008 Detroit Lions will be immortalized as the N.F.L’s worst team, but in a season in which so many teams played so badly, it is almost a shame that the Lions have to go into the record books alone.
